text: Improved for whom? Tried searching for previously installed software on PC yesterday and AI took over the screen dragging me into a rabbit hole of ambivalence. Makes me wonder if I can do without a start menu.

metadata.topic: RE: Microsoft stop messing with my people's task bar settings.
